stepAnswer: Every audience group you can identify requires content created specifically for them.
choices: You may have two distinct audiences (differentiated by role, for example), who are considered as one for your presentation.
Every audience group you can identify requires content created specifically for them.
You may have two distinct audiences (differentiated by role, for example), who are considered separately for your presentation.
The more you know about your audience, the better you can tailor your presentation to them.
